item.title: Hive 1.1.4
item.description:
What's changed:

  • Hive is now properly signed with Apple's certificate
  • improved behavior of the dock icon badge
  • added badge on the transactions tab icon in the sidebar
  • added link to a FAQ in the Help menu
  • fixed problem when migrating from an older version of Hive
  • fixed possible crash caused by other Java software in the system
  • updated App Store app
  • updated Filipino, Japanese translations

item.title: Hive 1.1.3
item.description:
What's changed:

  • fixed a crash in the backup window
  • fixed a crash in the send dialog in some language configurations
  • fixed some problems in the crash report tool
  • fixed application context menu not displaying in translated versions
  • updated some translations

item.title: Hive 1.1.2
item.description:
What's changed:

  • added a lock screen at startup, to prevent someone using your computer from seeing your contacts or transaction list (you can also lock the wallet manually with Cmd+L)
  • right-click context menu on the apps page - you can uninstall applications or contact the app author
  • Dropbox backup will be stored in Apps subdirectory if it exists (unless it's already configured)
  • updated App Store and Mobile Recharge apps
  • fixed problem with disabled submit button in the "Send" dialog

item.title: Hive 1.1.1
item.description:
What's changed:

  • fixed possible crash when opening QR code scanner or user's QR code popup
  • improved QR code scanning
  • fixed some UI issues on OSX 10.7
  • fixed minor UI issues in some languages
  • updated some translations
  • added alert bar that shows up when network connection is down
  • added social media links to "About" window
  • API: added a way to get installed application info

item.title: Hive 1.1
item.description:
What's changed:

  • scanning QR codes - in send window, add contact form and in the top menu
  • added button to display QR code for your own address
  • added “Send feedback” option in menu (see “Help” menu)
  • added info about source of exchange rates data (BitcoinAverage)
  • added cancel button to contact form
  • added warning notification if no backups are configured
  • added App Store app - discover and install more apps
  • updated Bitpremier, Bitstamp and Minefield apps
  • Dropbox backup folder can be changed by holding Alt when clicking “Enable”
  • additional local backups in the same directory, just in case everything else fails
  • added Hungarian translation
  • updated French, German, Greek, Polish, Romanian, Tagalog translations
  • various minor UI improvements
  • fixed crash on startup during Dropbox backup
  • API: added a method do install other apps
  • API: apps can specify which API version they require
  • API: list of available currencies
  • API: disabled WebKit same-origin policy hack

item.title: Hive 1.0
item.description:
Hive is now officially 1.0, woohoo!

What's changed:

  • first run wizard (only if you don't have a wallet yet)
  • if your wallet is unencrypted, you will now see a warning on every start
  • updated apps to latest versions
  • added new Bitstamp app, BitPremier, Coinbase, and Prepaid Mobile Recharge apps
  • "Get more apps" link on apps page
  • sent amount on the transactions list will not include the fee
  • fixed some problems with processing new transactions and transaction status changes
  • Dropbox backup now uses ~/Dropbox/Hive-* folder for backups (unless you've already configured it) - we'll add a way to change this soon
  • fixed some problems with backups
  • UI improvements in send dialog
  • fixed a few minor UI issues
  • updated Finnish, French, German, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish and Tagalog translations
  • updated bitcoinj library
